title: Aisijimo Nuhai
synopsis: The snow in the North Pole... the summer sun, the always cold North Pole. But the Eskimo girl did not feel sad or bored. Every day of her is a wonderful adventure, and these are extraordinary gifts for her. What will the next day bring? Will you bring her a phonograph and a life raft today? Tomorrow will give her an air horn or umbrella. What do these gifts mean? The Eskimos will accept these challenges and solve this mystery! (translated from iqiyi)
